00019 #ifndef _IPL98_IMAGECONSTCOLUMNIT24BP_H
00020 #define _IPL98_IMAGECONSTCOLUMNIT24BP_H
00021 
00022 #include "ipl98_types.h"
00023 #include "../kernel_c/image/kernel_functions.h"
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00037 class CImageConstColumnIterator24bp
00038 {
00039 protected: // attributes
00041         const TImage* m_pTImg;
00043     UINT8* m_pCurr;
00045         UINT8* m_pEnd;
00046 public:
00053         inline CImageConstColumnIterator24bp(UINT32 ColumnIndex, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex, const TImage* pTImg);
00055         inline CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& operator=(const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& It);
00058         inline CImageConstColumnIterator24bp End() const;
00060         inline CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& operator++(){m_pCurr-=m_pTImg->ByteWidth; return *this;}
00062         inline CImageConstColumnIterator24bp operator++(int){CImageConstColumnIterator24bp t=*this; m_pCurr-=m_pTImg->ByteWidth; return t;}
00064         inline UINT32 operator*(){return ((*((UINT32*)m_pCurr)) & 0xffffff);}
00066         inline const UINT32 operator[](UINT32 i) {return (*(m_pCurr-i*m_pTImg->ByteWidth) & 0xffffff);}
00069         inline friend bool operator==(const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& q);
00072         inline friend bool operator!=(const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& q);
00075         inline friend bool operator< (const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& q);
00076 };
00077 
00078 inline CImageConstColumnIterator24bp::CImageConstColumnIterator24bp(UINT32 ColumnIndex, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex,
00079                                                                                                                         const TImage* pTImg):
00080                 m_pTImg(pTImg), m_pCurr(pTImg->ppAllScanLines[StartIndex]+ColumnIndex*3), 
00081                 m_pEnd(m_pCurr-pTImg->ByteWidth*(MaxIndex-StartIndex))
00082 {
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 inline CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& CImageConstColumnIterator24bp::operator=(const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& It)
00087 {
00088         m_pTImg = It.m_pTImg;
00089         m_pCurr  = It.m_pCurr;
00090         m_pEnd   = It.m_pEnd;
00091         return *this;
00092 }
00093 
00094 inline CImageConstColumnIterator24bp CImageConstColumnIterator24bp::End() const
00095 {
00096         CImageConstColumnIterator24bp t = *this;
00097         t.m_pCurr = m_pEnd;
00098         return t;
00099 }
00100 
00101 inline bool operator==(const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& q)
00102 {
00103         return (p.m_pCurr==q.m_pCurr);
00104 }
00105 
00106 inline bool operator!=(const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& q)
00107 {
00108         return !(p==q);
00109 }
00110 
00111 inline bool operator<(const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator24bp& q)
00112 {
00113         return (p.m_pCurr<q.m_pCurr);
00114 }
00115 
00116 } // end namespace ipl
00117 
00118 #endif //_IPL98_IMAGECONSTCOLUMNIT24BP_H
